titleStmt.title: The declaration of Generall Massey, and Colonell Generall Poyntz. Shewing the true grounds and reasons that induced them to depart from the city, and for a while from the kingdome. With their resolutions what they intend for their owne safety, and the preservation of religion and Covenant, and the King and kingdome.
titleStmt.author: Massey, Edward, Sir, 1619?-1674?
Poyntz, Sydenham.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
